column4: i've been lazy and didn't upgrade from edgy to feisty yet, but doing so now
is it correct that one should have the meta pkg ubuntu-desktop installed?
for upgrades
I believe update-manager will take care of it or warn you... at least I hope it does
just tell people exactly what you want
yes.  locate does not find such a file
locate unfortunately misses files all the time.
it should be under: materials/metal/
where is materials? Start from Steam/
sb /hl2/materials/metal
I don't have that.  Let me start the game.  I may not have played it on wine yet
sorry, I don't have any of those files
pastebin your /etc/hostname and /etc/hosts
http://paste.ubuntu.com/22890/
hostname just has mcquaid in it
what does 'hostname' return?
reboot should fix it
when you chroot, aren't you root already?
no, you are root
I mean, when I do 'sudo chroot blah' I become root
and your prompt should now start with a #.  Does it?
so no need to sudo anything
np :)  might just be easier to backup and reinstall
you sure you don't have a separate /boot?
